LanguageData.OE_Drifter.title: obsidia drifter
LanguageData.OE_Drifter.description: [PAWN_nameDef] previously led a nomadic lifestyle. Constantly moving acquired useful skills for life in temporary camps.
LanguageData.OE_Exile.title: obsidia exile
LanguageData.OE_Exile.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out from an Obsidia enclave under unknown charges-real or fabricated. Survived in the wastes by any means necessary, becoming hard, quiet, and resourceful.
LanguageData.OE_Salvager.title: obsidia salvager
LanguageData.OE_Salvager.description: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed ancient battlefields and collapsed vaults, extracting anything of value. Knows how to strip a ruin clean—but often speaks in fragments and sparks.
LanguageData.OE_Scout.title: obsidia scout
LanguageData.OE_Scout.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a long-range scout for a drifting clan, trained to survive alone and report back unseen. Fast, quiet, and observant—but not one for deep study.
